channel.title: BUhealthAndWellness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 13 Tips to Warm Up When You’re Always Cold
item.description: Feeling cold all the time? Try these habits that may help you stay warmer -- and learn when it may be helpful to check in with your doctor.

item.title: Heartburn or Something More? How to Tell the Difference
The Overlooked Organ That Could Be Hiding Your True Alzheimer’s Risk
item.description: Turns out your brain isn’t the only organ influencing your brain biomarkers

item.title: The 3 Best Pre-Workout Snacks For A Major Energy Boost, From An RD
item.description: Found: Snacks that give you energy but never weigh you down.

item.title: AFib Patients Drank Coffee Every Day For 182 Days – Here’s What Happened
item.description: Coffee was long blamed for Afib—this study says the opposite

item.title: This Is The Major Cause Of Crepey Skin — Here's What To Do About It
item.description: Because who doesn't want to learn more about the road to tighter, more firm skin?

item.title: This "Normal" Sign Of Aging Could Actually Signal Dementia Risk
item.description: Here's why this scary finding could prove very helpful for disease prevention.
